author: jorton
msg: * configure.in: Move the ino_t test outside the enable_lfs=yes branch,
and only define apr_ino_t as unsigned long in the case where a 32-bit
ino_t is detected and hence may vary by _FILE_OFFSET_BITS; it's not
correctly on success even if actions-if-true are specified.

author: ruwan
msg: changing the scope "client" to "axis2-client" in order for it to be meaning full, (as per the asankha's comment)

author: arminw
msg: fix: don't delete orphan objects in 1:n references. This can cause problems when objects are moved (deleted from one, added to another object)

author: arminw
msg: add support to use the ODMG-api within the PB-api
